TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanel extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class StatusBarPanel Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
type StatusBarPanel = class inherit Component interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个面板。

span.span: Represents a panel in a control.

summary.span: 虽然 控件对以前版本的 控件的功能进行替换和添加，但是考虑到向后兼容性和将来的使用（如果您选择），仍然保留了 。

span.span: Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示控件的中的单个面板。 A represents an individual panel in the of a control. 可以包含文本和/或图标，可用于反映应用程序的状态。A can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application. 使用可通过控件的属性访问、检索、添加或删除个人。 Use the , accessible through the property of a control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual . 提供的属性可用于修改控件内面板的显示行为。 The provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a control. 您可以使用属性在面板中显示图标。You can use the property to display an icon within a panel. 此属性可用于在应用程序中提供状态的图形化表示形式。This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application. 使用属性可以指定面板内文本和/或图标的对齐方式。The property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel. 若要确保面板大小正确调整以适应面板的文本，可以使用属性来自动调整面板的大小以适合面板的文本或填充控件内的剩余空间。To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the control. 使用属性可以指定面板的最小宽度，以确保它不会小于其要显示的数据。The property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display. 控件通常用于显示有关应用程序的帮助信息或状态信息。The control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application. 通常，要显示有关面板中显示的数据的其他信息，这一点很重要。Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel. 当鼠标指针停留在面板上时，可以使用属性来显示信息。You can use the property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel. 尽管控件通常用于显示文本信息，但您也可以向提供自己的显示类型。 Although the control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a . 属性使您能够指定将如何绘制。 The property enables you to specify how the will be drawn. 默认情况下， 属性用于显示属性的值（如果在属性中指定，则显示一个图标）。By default, the property is used to display the value of the property (and an icon, if specified in the property). 如果将属性设置为，则可以在面板中绘制自己的信息。If the property is set to , you can draw your own information into the panel. 您可以使用此功能在面板中绘制进度栏或动画图标。You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel. 创建类的实例时，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 首先，命名`panel1`为，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名`panel2`为的，它显示当前日期，并使用类的属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并 使用属性访问的方法以将面板添加到中。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用、 、 和属性对对象进行初始化。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时，以下读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`| ||1010| ||| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||100100| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 首先，命名`panel1`为，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名`panel2`为的，它显示当前日期，并使用类的属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并 使用属性访问的方法以将面板添加到中。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用、 、 和属性对对象进行初始化。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板中文本和图标的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性在面板的边框内水平对齐分配给该属性的文本和/或图标。You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the property within the borders of the panel. 文本和图标可与的左对齐、右对齐或居中对齐。Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the . 无法独立定位中的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您不能将图标定位到的左侧，同时将文本对齐到右侧。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side. 图标始终定位到文本的左侧，而不考虑文本的对齐方式。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 、 、 和属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法中调用方法。 `InitializeStatusBarPanels`Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为的对象优先于将这些面板设置为值。 objects set to have precedence over those panels set to the value. 例如， 如果 将属性设置 为的，则其属性设置为时，将缩短。 For example, a that has its property set to is shortened if a with the property set to requires that space. 您可以使用来确保的内容在包含多个面板的控件中正确显示。You can use to ensure that the contents of a are properly displayed in a control that contains more than one panel. 例如，您可能希望包含文本的面板自动调整为显示的文本量（），而显示所有者描述的进度栏的另一个面板需要是固定大小（）.For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (), while another panel on the that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 首先，命名`panel1`为，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名`panel2`为的，它显示当前日期，并使用类的属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并 使用属性访问的方法以将面板添加到中。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用、 、 和属性对对象进行初始化。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法， `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置 `disposing` 为 `false` 的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.

value.span: 表示要显示在面板中的图标。

span.span: An that represents the icon to display in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来显示一个图标，该图标表示应用程序或应用程序中的进程的状态。You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application. 例如，可以在中显示一个图标，以指示文件保存操作是否正在进行或完成。For example, you can display an icon in a to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete. > [!NOTE] > 无法独立定位中的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，在使用属性对齐右侧的文本时，不能将图标定位在的左侧。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side using the property. 不管文本的对齐方式如何，图标始终定位到面板文本的左侧。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来指示是显示文本还是将面板作为所有者描述的管理。You can use this property to indicate whether a displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn . 若要确定何时需要绘制，请为控件的事件创建事件处理程序。To determine when a needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the event of the control. 作为参数传递给事件的事件处理程序的可用于确定需要绘制的面板。The passed as a parameter to an event handler of the event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn. 还提供了一个对象，您可以使用该对象在上执行绘制任务。 The also provides a object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性、 委托、 类、 枚举和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, delegate, class, enumeration, and property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或事件方法中调用方法。 `InitializeStatusBarPanels`Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示当属性设置为时显示的文本。This property represents the text that is displayed when the property is set to . 您可以使用此属性在控件中显示有关您的应用程序的信息。You can use this property to display information about your application in a control. 例如，当用户将鼠标移动到菜单上或显示在应用程序中打开的文件的名称和位置时，可以使用属性来显示帮助信息。For example, you can use the property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application. 若要在中对齐文本，请使用属性。To align the text within a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 首先，命名`panel1`为，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名`panel2`为的，它显示当前日期，并使用类的属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并 使用属性访问的方法以将面板添加到中。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用、 、 和属性对对象进行初始化。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与状态栏面板关联的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针停留在上时，可以使用此属性在工具提示中显示附加信息。You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a . 例如，您可以显示一个工具提示，它为显示文件传输状态的提供数据传输速度。For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a that displays the status of a file transfer. 若要在应用程序中显示其他控件的工具提示 ，请使用控件。To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 首先，命名`panel1`为，显示应用程序的状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个名`panel2`为的，它显示当前日期，并使用类的属性来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并 使用属性访问的方法以将面板添加到中。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用、 、 和属性对对象进行初始化。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中状态栏面板的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the control.
The width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终反映的实际宽度 ， 不能小于属性。 The property always reflects the actual width of a and cannot be smaller than the property. 若要将的宽度自动调整到的内容 ，可使用属性。To automatically resize the width of the to the contents of the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 、 、 和属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 在窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法中调用方法。 `InitializeStatusBarPanels`Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的宽度小于 属性的值。

span.span: The width specified is less than the value of the property.
